headline: CrowdStrike Expands Identity Security And Regional Clouds To Deepen Platform Role
summary: CrowdStrike Holdings is acquiring identity security firm SGNL and browser security company Seraphic Security. The company is expanding its Global Data Sovereignty program with new local cloud deployments in Saudi Arabia, India, and the UAE. These moves are aimed at strengthening identity and cloud security offerings while addressing regional data residency requirements. CrowdStrike Holdings (NasdaqGS:CRWD) is making a concentrated push into identity and cloud security with these...

headline: CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. (CRWD) Expansion into Cloud Security and Identity Protection Driving Growth
summary: CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:CRWD) is one of the best Nancy Pelosi stocks to buy in 2026. On January 27, Macquarie reiterated a Neutral rating on CrowdStrike Holdings Inc.
